exp.title: Deployable Resume (This website)
bullets: this website

exp.title: COVID19 Danger Data
bullets: Coded a website that displays SARS COVID-19 infection rate data by county as well as state fire data to help users determine safer counties to evacuate to during the pandemic
Utilized Google Maps API to display and color code the map by infection rate severity
Worked a team of three developers to research government sources and display the data in an easy to understand desktop website layout

exp.title: Weather Report
bullets: Coded a website that displays weather information by city
Utilized openWeather API to display weather weekly forecast data as well as 24-hour data

exp.title: Daily Schedule
bullets: Coded a website that helps users plan their day and complete tasks
In the process of developing this project further into a Google-Calander like format

exp.title: Simple Game AI
bullets: Translated ‘Flappy Bird’ Python code to a more object-oriented script to cater to AI
Implemented a NEAT artificial intelligence to learn to play ’Flappy Bird’

exp.title: Line Following Robot
bullets: Achieved ‘Most Accurately Following Robot’, Top 5 overall
Led four team members of higher expertise to execute our agreed design
Assembled and programmed a robot using a 3D printed chassis and Arduino system

exp.title: 3D Printed Speaker
bullets: Final product ran on a 5v battery, connected via Bluetooth and AUX cord
Designed, soldered, and assembled speaker with 3D printed case
Used OSH park for custom circuit board fabrication

exp.title: 3D Printed brushless DC Motor
bullets: 5v motor/generator featured in CCTE Engineering Showcase 2017
Designed, fabricated, and assembled rotor, case and circuitry
Researched over 50 websites to learn motor fundamentals and industry designs

exp.title: Customer Service Representative
bullets: Consistently satisfied customers with product preparation times, cashier, phone operator, driver management during normal and peak hours
Consistent cleaning above and beyond duties which resulted in higher marks for the store
Part of the team that trains new CSRs to reduce time for product output

exp.title: Saddleback Teardown Leader
bullets: Consistently manages restocking of inventory to ensure church property is maintained
Connects with church volunteers consistently through virtual platforms throughout COVID
Assists other leaders with organizing events and management of church events

exp.title: Tutoring Officer
exp.source: Air Force Junior Reserve Officer Training Corps
bullets: Lead after school tutoring programto surpass its goal of 100 hours: 124 total tutoring hours
Developed an additional part of the AFJROTC program which provided student taught courses on public speaking, time management and foreign languages
Personally tutored 17 hours in Calculus and Physics C
